lastfm.name: Monolink
lastfm.bio: Monolink is the stage name of Steffen Linck, a German Liveact, singer-songwriter and electronic dance music producer who specializes in ambient, techno, electronica and house genres. https://www.mono.link/ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monolink https://www.facebook.com/monolink https://twitter.com/monolinklive https://www.instagram.com/monolinkmusic/ https://soundcloud.com/monolink Read more on Last.fm
